Room.name: Abandoned Hallway
Room.description: You stand in an abandoned hallway There is a dimly lit light on the wall fueled by some unknown source There is a door to the north at the end of the hall and a door to your south leading outside.

Room.name: A small study
Room.description: You are in a small study There is a shitty desk here with papers strewn about There is a grandfather clock on the wall stuck at 4:15 There is a small door to the south and a double door to the east.

Room.name: A studio
Room.description: You are in a wide open art studio. There are paintings strewn about the floor and sitting on easles. There is a door to the west and the studio opens into a hallway to the north.

Room.name: Northern Hallway
Room.description: This hallways has pictures of Grandmother Jones on the wall She is ugly as fuck and you hate her by default. The hall continues south to the studio. There are doors to the east and west.

Room.name: The outer porch
Room.description: You stand upon the outer porch There is a mat on the ground that says 'fuck off' You sense there could be black people around A door stands to your north, foreboding.

Room.name: Rochester Room
Room.description: This room is full of soiled linens. Surely the maid should make her way here. The only exit is the door to the west.

Room.name: A clean bedroom
Room.description: This is a neat bedroom with a thick red bed in the middle. There are armoires about and a nightstand with a cookie cake on it. You can't have the cake. There is a door to the east and you might be able to sneak out the window to the west.

Room.name: The SideYard
Room.description: You are in the sideyard. Careful there could be mad doggos in here, or cat burglars, or black people! You better climb back in the east window before you get rape mugged.
